subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Out of body? Spirit walking.
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-2019700134-1191038122=:34652
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I know what ya mean. I always wished I could do what a few others can and do it at my own pace. However this isnt something I do on purpose at all. and rolling around inside the body is well weird LOL I wake up feeling like a just had an exorcist moment where I flipped something around that shouldnt flip that way.
   
  But I admit if I could walk off, leave the body.. I aint comin back LOL so perhaps thats why its a 'confined' experience.
   
  Misty

mamarottweiler@... wrote:
            I envy your ability to be able to do it at all. That is something I have always dreamed of.
     Suzy
   
  


HOSPICE- Adding life to days when we can't add days to life.
